1: MATCH (sys:System)-[:related_software]-(si:SoftwareInstallation) WHERE ( si.product = "Docker" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker CLI" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker Desktop" AND si.version >= "4.10.1" AND si.version <= "4.34.2" ) RETURN sys;
2: MATCH (sys:System)-[:related_software]-(si:SoftwareInstallation) WHERE ( si.product = "Docker" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker CLI" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker Desktop" AND si.version >= "4.10.1" AND si.version <= "4.34.2" ) MATCH (role:AssignedSystemRole)-[:assigned_for]-(sys) RETURN DISTINCT role;
3: MATCH (sys:System)-[:related_software]-(si:SoftwareInstallation) WHERE ( si.product = "Docker" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker CLI" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker Desktop" AND si.version >= "4.10.1" AND si.version <= "4.34.2" ) MATCH (serPro:ServiceProvider)-[:provides_service]-(sys) RETURN serPro;
4: MATCH (sys:System)-[:related_software]-(si:SoftwareInstallation) WHERE ( si.product = "Docker" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker CLI" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker Desktop" AND si.version >= "4.10.1" AND si.version <= "4.34.2" ) MATCH (sys)-[:related_ipaddress]-(ip:IPAddress)-[:in_segment]-(vns:VirtualNetworkSegment)-[:owned_by]-(org:OrgUnit) RETURN count( DISTINCT org);
5: MATCH (sys:System)-[:related_software]-(si:SoftwareInstallation) WHERE ( si.product = "Docker" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker CLI" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker Desktop" AND si.version >= "4.10.1" AND si.version <= "4.34.2" ) MATCH (sys)-[:related_ipaddress]-(ip:IPAddress)-[:in_segment]-(vns:VirtualNetworkSegment)-[:owned_by]-(org:OrgUnit) MATCH (p:Person)-[:head_of]-(org) RETURN count( DISTINCT p);
6: MATCH (sys:System)-[:related_software]-(si:SoftwareInstallation) WHERE ( si.product = "Docker" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker CLI" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker Desktop" AND si.version >= "4.10.1" AND si.version <= "4.34.2" ) MATCH (app:Application)-[:runs_on]-(sys) RETURN DISTINCT app;
7: MATCH (sys:System)-[:related_software]-(si:SoftwareInstallation) WHERE ( si.product = "Docker" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker CLI" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker Desktop" AND si.version >= "4.10.1" AND si.version <= "4.34.2" ) MATCH (sys)-[:in_country]-(ctry:Country) RETURN DISTINCT ctry;
8: MATCH (sys:System)-[:related_software]-(si:SoftwareInstallation) WHERE ( si.product = "Docker" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker CLI" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker Desktop" AND si.version >= "4.10.1" AND si.version <= "4.34.2" ) MATCH (asrole:AssignedSystemRole)-[:assigned_for]-(sys) MATCH (p:Person)-[:role_assigned]-(asrole) RETURN DISTINCT p;
9: MATCH (sys:System)-[:related_software]-(si:SoftwareInstallation) WHERE ( si.product = "Docker" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker CLI" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker Desktop" AND si.version >= "4.10.1" AND si.version <= "4.34.2" ) MATCH (sys)-[:related_ipaddress]-(ip:IPAddress)-[:in_segment]-(VNS:VirtualNetworkSegment)-[:at_location]-(loc:Location)  RETURN DISTINCT loc;
10: MATCH (sys:System)-[:related_software]-(si:SoftwareInstallation) WHERE ( si.product = "Docker" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker CLI" AND si.version >= "23.0" AND si.version <= "26.1.3" ) OR ( si.product = "Docker Desktop" AND si.version >= "4.10.1" AND si.version <= "4.34.2" ) MATCH (p:Person) - [:role_assigned] - (role:AssignedSystemRole) - [:assigned_for] - (sys) RETURN p.fullname, role.label;
